alert.note: Alert for Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 3:27PM CDT until May 18 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Northern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... Southern Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern White Earth Nation, or 32 miles west of Bemidji, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bemidji, Park Rapids, Fosston, Bagley, Mahnomen, McIntosh and Bad Medicine Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Polk
